item.title: 給自己的Hugo筆記

item.title: 關於Python的包裝機制
item.description: 簡介 來源 由 www.python.org - Python, GPL, Wikipedia 要寫Python很容易，只要安裝好環境之後，在terminal啟動python，直接打上程式碼就能得到執行結果，例如輸入

Bo-Wun, a software engineer, is interested in artificial intelligence and software engineering. Actually, writing something valuable is another interest for Bo-Wun. This is a place to post some notes, good articles, and some experience. Feel free to connect Bo-Wun via github or send him an email. Of course, you can also comment below direclty :) Hope this website can bring you the energy of progress. Last, never give up, because we have much more potential than we imagined !
